title: Omicron Variant detected in almost 99% of Sri Lankan COVID cases
content: Sri Lankaâ€™s health ministry had warned that approximately 99% of the COVID-19 cases reported at present, are those who are infected with the Omicron variant.Earlier, the University of Sri Jayawardenapura also reported that the Omicron variant is the dominant variant in Sri Lanka.The Health Ministry also told News 1st that the Sri Lankan hospitals posses the required number of beds for COVID-19 patients.
